REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0724 reute u f BC-BADGER-<BMI>-SEES-NO 03-12 0060

TEXT.TITLE: BADGER <BMI> SEES NO REASON FOR TRADING ACTIVITY
TEXT.BODY: Badger Meter Inc said it was not aware of any reason for the unusual trading activity in its common stock. Badger was trading at 21-5/8, up 1-5/8. The company made the statement in response to an inquiry from the American Stock Exchange regarding the unusual activity in its stock. Reuter
